title: 5127 S. Greenwood
posting_body: This spacious 3 bedroom/2 bath condo unit is perfect for families or 2 or more roommates.
It has large and separate living and dining rooms, and a separate kitchen.
The main bedroom has its own bathroom that can also be shared via a second door to the hallway.
Both bathrooms were renovated this year.
The home also has built in air conditioning wall units that are extremely quiet and feel like central air, while allowing for 4 different zone controls.
Air conditioning units also provide heat separate from the buildings included radiators for more control in the winter.
Unit includes one parking spot in the back and plenty of on-street parking at front.
Great shared balcony, big enough to grill and entertain.
Next to a great playground for kids and in a quiet area of Hyde Park.
Easy access to transportation to the University of Chicago and downtown.
Within walking distance to all the stores and restaurants on 53rd street.
Apartment will be available in September.
Potential for some furnishings to remain if desired (couches, desks, and other furniture).
